name: aiscr-global-pmo
description: AISCR Global PMO - Automated Excel System & Web Application

scripts.build: python create_pmo_system.py && python create_word_templates.py && python create_zip.py
scripts.deploy:netlify: bash scripts/deploy.sh netlify production || scripts\deploy.bat netlify production
scripts.deploy:staging: bash scripts/deploy.sh netlify staging || scripts\deploy.bat netlify staging

author: AISCR Global
